ConfigParam.Description: translate('#LDS#Approver must enter a reason for rejection of a request') + " (" +DataCaption("PersonWantsOrg") + ")"
ConfigParam.LongDescription: translate('#LDS#Approver must enter a reason for the rejection of an request.')

ConfigParam.Description: translate('#LDS#Approver may change end date of a request')
translate('#LDS#Approver may ask a colleague for help regarding a decision')
translate('#LDS#Warn <x> days before a request expires')
ConfigParam.LongDescription: translate('#LDS#How many days before expiration of a request the user should be informed.')

ConfigParam.Description: translate("#LDS#Additional filter for requests to be approved")
translate("#LDS#Filter for requests that require user interaction during approval")
translate('#LDS#Approver may change start date of a request')

Column.Name: CountAll
Column.Expression: from pwotodecide select count() where uid_accproduct = (select current uid_accproduct from accproduct)

Column.Name: UID_AccProductParamCategoryEffective
Column.Expression: isnullorempty( uid_accproductparamcategory, if(not(isnullorempty(uid_accproductgroup)))then objectwalker("FK(uid_accproductgroup).uid_accproductparamcategory")+"" )

Column.Name: HelperIsReusable
HelperIsReusableWithUnsubscribe
UID_AccProduct
Column.Expression: from ITShopOrg select top 1 uid_accproduct where uid_itshoporg = ( select current uid_org from pwotodecide)

Column.Name: IsAdditionalAllowed
Column.Expression: 1 = (from QERWorkingStep select count() where IsAdditionalAllowed and UID_QERWorkingStep in (from PWOHelperPWO select UID_QERWorkingStep where UID_PersonWantsOrg = (select current UID_PersonWantsOrg from PWOToDecide)))

Column.Name: isInsteadOfAllowed
Column.Expression: 1 = (from QERWorkingStep select count() where isInsteadOfAllowed and UID_QERWorkingStep in (from PWOHelperPWO select UID_QERWorkingStep where UID_PersonWantsOrg = (select current UID_PersonWantsOrg from PWOToDecide)))

Column.Name: DisplayPersonDeny
Column.Expression: from pwodecisionhistory select top 1 displayvalue(uid_personhead) where (not(isdecisionbysystem) and decisiontype = 'Dismiss' and uid_personwantsorg = ( select current uid_personwantsorg from pwotodecide)) order by datehead desc

Column.Name: LastDecisionDateDismiss
Column.Expression: from pwodecisionhistory select top 1 datehead where (decisiontype = 'Dismiss' and uid_personwantsorg = ( select current uid_personwantsorg from pwotodecide)) order by datehead desc

Column.Name: LastDecisionDateApproveManual
Column.Expression: from pwodecisionhistory select top 1 datehead where (decisiontype = 'Grant' and uid_personwantsorg = ( select current uid_personwantsorg from pwotodecide)) order by datehead desc

Column.Name: LastDecisionText
Column.Expression: from pwotodecide select current ( -- if there has been a negative decision after the most recent manual positive decision if(isnull(lastdecisiondateapprovemanual) or LastDecisionDateDismiss > LastDecisionDateApproveManual) then (from pwodecisionhistory select top 1 displayvalue(reasonhead) where (decisiontype = 'Dismiss' and uid_personwantsorg = ( select current uid_personwantsorg from pwotodecide)) order by datehead desc) else getnull() )

Column.Name: LastDecisionByPersonText
Column.Expression: from pwodecisionhistory select top 1 displayvalue(reasonhead) where (not(isdecisionbysystem) and decisiontype = 'Dismiss' and uid_personwantsorg = ( select current uid_personwantsorg from pwotodecide)) order by datehead desc

Column.Name: CheckStatusSemaphor
Column.Comment: increment this field to trigger recalculation of check status

Column.Name: ApproverCanEditParameters
Column.Expression: --direct and indirect assigned category exists("accproductparameter", format("uid_accproductparamcategory = '{0}' and {1}", from AccProduct select UID_AccProductParamCategoryEffective where uid_accProduct = (from pwotodecide select current uid_accproduct) , sqlcompare("approvercanedit", true, "bool", "equal")))

Column.Name: UID_QERJustificationSelected
Column.FKWhereClause: sqland( sqlcompare("JustificationType", if(from pwotodecide select current doapprove) then 4 else 16, "int", "bitsset", "none"), sqlcompare("IsDecisionBySystem", 1,"bool","notequal","none") )

Column.Name: TableName
Column.Expression: {{ QER.CompositionApi.ITShop.AccProductUsageCache.Instance.GetAsync(_Database, this.TableStore.GetLocalColumn(this.PWOToDecide, "UID_AccProduct").GetValue(queryRow)).Result.TableName }}+""

Column.Name: MustApproveTermsOfUse
Column.Expression: uid_personordered = getuser() and uid_accproduct in (select uid_accproduct from accproduct where not(isnullorempty(uid_qertermsofuse))) and not(uid_personwantsorg in ( select uid_personwantsorg from pwodecisionhistory where uid_qerjustification = 'QER-95f268209082426aa7d8b5e6d5e0d242')) -- user has already approved terms of use

Column.Name: QERJustificationRequiresText
Column.Expression: Exists("QERJustification",SqlAnd(SqlCompareUid("UID_QERJustification",UID_QERJustificationSelected),SqlCompare("RequiresText", 1,"bool","equal","none")))

Column.Name: HasApproveJustifications
Column.Expression: 0 < DbCount("QERJustification", sqland( sqlcompare("JustificationType", 4, "int", "bitsset", "none"), sqlcompare("IsDecisionBySystem", 1,"bool","notequal","none")) )

Column.Name: HasDenyJustifications
Column.Expression: 0 < DbCount("QERJustification", sqland( sqlcompare("JustificationType", 16, "int", "bitsset", "none"), sqlcompare("IsDecisionBySystem", 1,"bool","notequal","none")) )

Column.Name: QERJustificationApproveRequiresText
Column.Expression: Exists("QERJustification",SqlAnd(SqlCompareUid("UID_QERJustification",UID_QERJustificationApprove),SqlCompare("RequiresText", 1,"bool","equal","none")))

Column.Name: QERJustificationDenyRequiresText
Column.Expression: Exists("QERJustification",SqlAnd(SqlCompareUid("UID_QERJustification",UID_QERJustificationDeny),SqlCompare("RequiresText", 1,"bool","equal","none")))

DataTableCRView.RelationDBWhereClause: format("UID_PWOHelperPWO in ( select pwoh.UID_PWOHelperPWO from PWOHelperPWO pwoh join PersonWantsOrg pwo on pwo.UID_PersonWantsOrg = pwoh.UID_PersonWantsOrg and pwo.DecisionLevel = pwoh.LevelNumber where {0})", SqlAnd( sqlcompareuid("pwoh.UID_PersonHead",GetUser()), SqlEmpty("pwoh.Decision","string"), if(IsEscalationApproval())then sqlcompare("pwoh.RulerLevel", 2, "int", "Equal") else sqlcompare("pwoh.RulerLevel", 2, "int", "NotEqual") ) )

DataTableFKView.ViewFKWhereClause: uid_accproduct in ( select uid_accproduct from pwotodecide where mustapprovetermsofuse)

DataTableDbObject.WhereClauseSQL: format("UID_PWOHelperPWO in ( select pwoh.UID_PWOHelperPWO from PWOHelperPWO pwoh join PersonWantsOrg pwo on pwo.UID_PersonWantsOrg = pwoh.UID_PersonWantsOrg and pwo.DecisionLevel = pwoh.LevelNumber where {0})", SqlAnd( SqlIn("pwoh.Decision","string",Split("P,N",",",false)), SqlInWithFormat("pwo.UID_PersonWantsOrg","string","NonUnicodeLiterals",from PWOToDecide select UID_PersonWantsOrg where ((Doapprove or DoReject) and UID_PersonWantsOrg in (select UID_PersonWantsOrg from SubLevelCounter where States > 1))) ) )

DataTableView.ViewExpression: select distinct (UID_PersonWantsOrg,Len(SubLevelNumberConcat(UID_PersonWantsOrg)) as States) from PWOHelperPWO

ContainerTemplate.WhereClause: uid_accproduct = ( select current uid_accproduct from pwotodecide)

Container.ItemUID: Warning if person has denied or other dismiss decision and directlink to this decision

Label.Text: from pwotodecide select current translate("#LDS#Denied by {0}: {1}", displaypersondeny, isnullorempty(lastdecisionbypersontext, translate("#LDS#No reason entered")))
from pwotodecide select current lastdecisiontext

SwitchContainerCase.Condition: (getconfig("VI_ITShop_ApproverCanSetValidFrom")="true") and not(from PWOToDecide select current OrderState = 'OrderUnsubscribe')

Label.Text:
from PWOToDecide select current
if(DateEmpty(validfromnew)) then (if( DateEmpty(validfrom) ) then translate("#LDS#immediately") else formatdate(Validfrom, "d")) else formatdate(validfromnew,"d")

ValidationModifier.Text: translate("#LDS#The specified validity period is invalid. The validity end date is before the validity start date. Please change the validity period.")

Label.Text: translate("#LDS#You may set the start date of the validity of this request.")

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: select current display() from pwotodecide

Label.Text: from PWOToDecide select current if( isnull(validfrom) ) then translate("#LDS#immediately") else formatdate(ValidFrom, "d")

Container.Condition: from PWOToDecide select Current DoApprove Or HasExpiredValidUntilWithDeny()

SwitchContainerCase.Condition: ( ((getconfig("VI_ITShop_ApproverCanSetValidUntil")="true") And Not(from PWOToDecide select Current OrderState = 'OrderUnsubscribe')) Or HasExpiredValidUntilWithDeny() ) And( (isnull(getconfig("VI_ITShop_DisableHideValidUntilQERReuse"),"false")="true") Or (isnull(getconfig("VI_ITShop_DisableHideValidUntilQERReuse"),"false")="false" And "QERReuse" <> from PWOToDecide select Current TableName ) )

Label.Text:
from PWOToDecide select current
if(DateEmpty(validuntilnew)) then (if( DateEmpty(validuntil) ) then translate("#LDS#unlimited") else formatdate(ValidUntil, "d")) else formatdate(validuntilnew,"d")

ValidationModifier.Text: translate("#LDS#The specified validity period is invalid. The validity end date is before the validity start date. Please change the validity period.")

Label.Text: translate("#LDS#You may set the end date of the validity of this request.")
translate("#LDS#This product can only be requested for {0} days.", GetMaxValidDays(from PWOToDecide select Current UID_Org))

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: select current display() from pwotodecide

Label.Text: from PWOToDecide select current if( isnull(validuntil) ) then translate("#LDS#unlimited") else formatdate(ValidUntil, "d")
from PWOToDecide select current IsNullOrEmpty(DisplayValue(UID_QERJustificationSelected),IsNullOrEmpty(ReasonForDecision,translate("#LDS#Enter a reason")))
translate("#LDS#Please enter a reason for your decision.")

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: select current display() from pwotodecide

Function.Name: CanDelegateOrAddApprover()
Function.Expression: NOT (select current IsReserved from pwotodecide) and ( (not(from PWOHelperPWO select top 1 IsFromDelegation where UID_PersonWantsOrg = (select current UID_PersonWantsOrg from pwotodecide))) and ('' = (from PWOHelperPWO select top 1 isnull(UID_PersonAdditional,'') where UID_PersonWantsOrg = (select current UID_PersonWantsOrg from pwotodecide))) and ('' = (from PWOHelperPWO select top 1 isnull(UID_PersonInsteadOf,'') where UID_PersonWantsOrg = (select current UID_PersonWantsOrg from pwotodecide))) )

Function.Name: SqlFilterNotNextDecisionMaker()
Function.Expression: format("UID_Person not in (select UID_PersonHead from {0} where OrderNumber = 1)", sqlfunctioncalltable("QER","GITShop", "FTPwoNextDecisionMaker",sqlformatvalue(from pwotodecide select current UID_PersonWantsOrg,"string", "NonUnicodeLiterals")))

Function.Name: DbWhereClause()
Function.Expression:
if(IsEscalationApproval()) then DbWhereClauseEscalation() else
sqland( getconfig("VI_ITShop_ApprovalAdditionalWhereClause"),
"uid_personwantsorg in (select uid_personwantsorg from QER_VITShopDecisionPerson where "+ sqland( sqlcompare("rulerlevel", 2, "int", "NotEqual"), sqlcompare("decisionorcomment", "D","string","equal", "NonUnicodeLiterals"), sqlcompareuid("uid_person", select uid_person from user),
(if(isnull(request("UID_Personwantsorg"),'')<>"") then sqlcompareuid("uid_personwantsorg", request("UID_Personwantsorg")) else ""),
(if(isnull(request("aeweb_UID_PWOHelperPWO"),'')<>"") then sqland( "uid_personwantsorg in (select uid_personwantsorg from pwohelperpwo where "+ sqlcompareuid("uid_pwohelperpwo", request("aeweb_UID_PWOHelperPWO")) +")") else getnull()))
+")" )

Function.Name: FormTitle()
Function.Expression: if(IsEscalationApproval()) then translate('#LDS#IT Shop Escalation Approval') else translate('#LDS#Heading Pending Requests')

Function.Name: DbWhereClauseEscalation()

FunctionValue.Expression: from pwotodecide select uid_personwantsorg where mustapprovetermsofuse and uid_accproduct = uidAccProduct

Function.Name: AllowAutoApprove()
Function.Expression: canedit(DoApprove) and not(exists("personwantsorg", format("uid_personwantsorg = '{0}' and {1}", uid_personwantsorg, getconfig("VI_ITShop_Approvals_InteractiveApproval"))))

Function.Name: SubLevelNumberConcat(string UID)
Function.Expression: Concat(from PWOHelperPWO select distinct SubLevelNumber where UID_PersonWantsOrg = UID,"")

Function.Name: GetNextSubLevelNumber()
Function.Expression: if(0 = from PWOHelperPWO select count() where UID_PersonWantsOrg = (from PWOToDecide select current UID_PersonWantsOrg) and not(SubLevelNumber in(from PWOHelperPWOAllReadyDone select SubLevelNumber where UID_PersonWantsOrg = (from PWOToDecide select current (UID_PersonWantsOrg)))))then -1 else from PWOHelperPWO select Min(SubLevelNumber) where UID_PersonWantsOrg = (from PWOToDecide select current UID_PersonWantsOrg) and not(SubLevelNumber in(from PWOHelperPWOAllReadyDone select SubLevelNumber where UID_PersonWantsOrg = (from PWOToDecide select current (UID_PersonWantsOrg))))

Function.Name: UseTempQueue()
Function.Expression: 10 <= select count() from PWOToDecide where (doapprove or doreject)

Function.Name: HasExpiredValidUntilWithDeny()
Function.Expression: (from PWOToDecide select Current OrderState = 'OrderUnsubscribe') And (from PWOToDecide select Current ValidUntil < GetDate()) And (from PWOToDecide select Current DoReject) And (from PWOToDecide select Current DateEmpty(ValidUntilProlongation))

Function.Name: GetMaxValidDays(string UID)
Function.Expression: from AccProduct select MaxValidDays Where UID_AccProduct in (from ITShopOrg select UID_AccProduct Where UID_ITShopOrg = UID)

Update.WhereClause: -- NULL field when type of decision changes uid_personwantsorg = (select current uid_personwantsorg from pwotodecide)

ActionSequence.Condition: (1= from pwotodecide select count()) and -- interactive approval allowed? from pwotodecide select top 1 AllowAutoApprove()

Update.Value: if (not DateEmpty(validuntilprolongation)) then validuntilprolongation else if (not DateEmpty(validuntil)) then validuntil -- else leave the validuntilnew empty

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: from pwotodecide select top 1 ( translate("#LDS#You have denied the approval of the product {0} for {1}.", displayvalue(uid_org), displayvalue(uid_personordered)))

ActionSequence.Condition: (("true" <> getconfig("VI_ITShop_ApproverReasonMandatoryOnDeny") and request("aeweb_decision") = 'Deny') or (request("aeweb_decision") = 'Approve')) and from pwotodecide select top 1 AllowAutoApprove()

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: ( from pwotodecide select top 1 ( if( doapprove) then translate("#LDS#You have approved the request of the product {0} for {1}.", displayvalue(uid_org), displayvalue(uid_personordered)) else translate("#LDS#You have denied the request of the product {0} for {1}.", displayvalue(uid_org), displayvalue(uid_personordered))))

Update.Value: if (not DateEmpty(validuntilprolongation)) then validuntilprolongation else if (not DateEmpty(validuntil)) then validuntil -- else leave the validuntilnew empty

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: if(IsEscalationApproval()) then translate("#LDS#Enter at least one of the filters to view pending requests.") else translate('#LDS#You are entitled to approve or deny the following requests.')

Label.Text: from pwotodecide select current translate("#LDS#Denied by {0}: {1}", displaypersondeny, isnullorempty(lastdecisionbypersontext, translate("#LDS#No reason entered")))
from pwotodecide select current lastdecisiontext

Container.ItemUID: Does the user need to accept terms of use?

Label.Text: translate("#LDS#You must accept the terms of use before proceeding.")

Update.WhereClause: uid_personwantsorg = ( select current uid_personwantsorg from pwotodecide)

ObjectSwitchContainer.ObjectKey: from pwotodecide select current getobjectkey("AccProduct", uid_accproduct, "")

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: translate("#LDS#You must accept the terms of use before proceeding.")
uid_accproduct = (from pwotodecide select current uid_accproduct)

MenuElement.Tooltip: translate("#LDS#Send inquiry for this request to another identity")
MenuElement.Condition: convert(isnull(getconfig("VI_ITShop_WantSeeQueryToPerson"),'false'), 'Boolean') and 0 = (from PWOHelperPWOForRecallQuery select count() where UID_PersonWantsOrg = (from pwotodecide select current UID_PersonWantsOrg))

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: select current uid_personwantsorg from pwotodecide

Checkpoint.WhereClause: PrimaryKey() = from PWOToDecide select current PrimaryKey()

LoadTable.WhereClause: SqlCompareUid("UID_AccProductParamCategory", from AccProduct select UID_AccProductParamCategoryEffective where UID_AccProduct = (select current uid_accproduct from pwotodecide))

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: translate("#LDS#Request information")

Label.Text: from AccProductParamCategory select DisplayValue(Description)

MenuElement.Tooltip: translate("#LDS#Show entire request with which this product was requested")

Update.WhereClause: UID_ShoppingCartOrder = (from pwotodecide select current UID_ShoppingCartOrder) and not(DoNotAllowApprove)

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: Translate('#LDS#If you do not wish to approve this request, you may reroute the approval to one of the following steps.')

MenuElement.Condition: -- check whether it is allowed to add approvers select current IsAdditionalAllowed from pwotodecide and CanDelegateOrAddApprover()
MenuElement.Tooltip: translate("#LDS#Add additional approver for this request")

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: translate("#LDS#Please enter the reason for adding an approver")

MenuElement.Condition: -- check whether it is allowed to delegate approvals select current IsInsteadOfAllowed from pwotodecide -- check whether I can approve due to a delegation -- and check whether I can further delegate a delegated approval and CanDelegateOrAddApprover()
MenuElement.Tooltip: translate("#LDS#Delegate approval for this request to another approver")

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: translate("#LDS#Please enter the reason for delegating this request")

MenuElement.Condition: 1 = (from PWOHelperPWO select count() where IsFromDelegation And RulerLevel <> 2 and UID_PersonWantsOrg = (select current UID_PersonWantsOrg from pwotodecide) and NOT (select current IsReserved from pwotodecide) )
MenuElement.Tooltip: translate("#LDS#Reject approval for this request and send it back to orignal approver")

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: translate("#LDS#Please enter the reason for denying the decision")

MenuElement.Tooltip: translate("#LDS#Escalate approval so that a fallback approver or member of the chief approval team can decide on this request")
MenuElement.Condition: Exists("QERWorkingStep", SqlAnd( SqlCompare("EscalationSteps", 0, "int", "NotEqual"), format( "UID_QERWorkingStep in(select UID_QERWorkingStep from QER_VITShopDecisionPerson where {0})", SqlAnd( SqlCompareUid("UID_Person",GetUser()), SqlCompareUid("UID_PersonWantsOrg",from PWOToDecide select current UID_PersonWantsOrg), SqlCompare("DecisionLevel", from PWOToDecide select current DecisionLevel, "int", "equal") -- Only for Escalation? Comment In! -- ,SqlCompare("RulerLevel", 2, "int", "Equal") ) ) ) )

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: translate("#LDS#Enter a reason for escalating this request")

MenuElement.Tooltip: translate("#LDS#Set the priority for this request")

Checkpoint.WhereClause: PrimaryKey() = from PWOToDecide select current PrimaryKey()

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: translate("#LDS#Set the priority for this request")
from PWOToDecide select current displayvalue(uid_org)
"imx-icon imx-table-"+(from PWOToDecide select current tablename)

Button.EnabledCondition: 0 < select count() from PWOToDecide where (DoApprove or DoReject)

ActionSequence.Condition: 0 = select count() from pwotodecide where (doapprove or doreject)

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: translate('#LDS#You have not made any decisions.')
translate('#LDS#No decisions were made')

Update.Value: if (not DateEmpty(validuntilprolongation)) then validuntilprolongation else if (not DateEmpty(validuntil)) then validuntil -- else leave the validuntilnew empty

Label.Text: FormTitle() + " - " + translate('#LDS#Approvals')

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: translate('#LDS#Please supply a reason for your decisions. You may enter one reason for all decisions as well as specific reasons for every decision.')

Container.RefreshTriggerExpression: Union(from Vars select QERJustificationApproveRequiresText,from Vars select QERJustificationDenyRequiresText)

SingleColumn.Condition: (0 < select count() from pwotodecide where doapprove) and from Vars select QERJustificationApproveRequiresText
(0 < select count() from pwotodecide where doapprove) and not(from Vars select QERJustificationApproveRequiresText)
0 < select count() from pwotodecide where doapprove and HasApproveJustifications()
(0 < select count() from pwotodecide where doreject) and from Vars select QERJustificationDenyRequiresText
(0 < select count() from pwotodecide where doreject) and not(from Vars select QERJustificationDenyRequiresText)
0 < select count() from pwotodecide where doreject and HasDenyJustifications()

Label.Text: datacaption(pwotodecide, uid_org)
translate("#LDS#Valid from")
translate("#LDS#Valid until")

ActionSequence.Condition: 0 = select count() from pwotodecide where (doapprove or doreject)

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: translate('#LDS#You have not made any decisions.')
translate('#LDS#No decisions were made')

ActionSequence.Condition: (0 < select count() from pwotodecide where (doreject and isnull(ReasonForDecision,'')='' and IsNull(UID_QERJustificationSelected,'')='')) and (from vars select isnull(ReasonDeny,'')='') and (from vars select isnull(UID_QERJustificationDeny,'')='') and ("true"=getconfig("VI_ITShop_ApproverReasonMandatoryOnDeny"))

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: translate('#LDS#Please supply a reason when denying a request.')
translate('#LDS#Reason missing')

ActionSequence.Condition: 0 < select count() from pwotodecide where (isnull(doapprove,false) or isnull(doreject,false))

Update.WhereClause: -- special handling for manager change -- when the new manager denies, reset the new manager value doreject and uid_accproduct = 'QER-9F7E5C3156D54C979C427FDB081C7056'

ActionSequence.Condition: 0 < from SubLevelCounter select count() where States > 1
ActionSequence.ItemUID: Is there a decision with more then one SubLevelNumber?

MethodParameter.Name: 'strReasonText'
"uidJustification"

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: if( 1 = from PWOToDecide select count() where (DoApprove or DoReject) ) then translate('#LDS#Your decision has been saved.') else translate('#LDS#{0} decisions have been saved.', from PWOToDecide select count() where (doapprove or doreject))

Label.Text: translate("#LDS#The request was already processed.")

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: translate("#LDS#The request was already processed. See below for more information about the current status of the request.")
translate("#LDS#See below for more information about the current status of the request.")
SqlCompareUid("UID_PersonWantsOrg",from Vars select UID_PersonWantsOrg)
